titles.title: SF441 As water to the thirsty

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
As water to the thirsty,
as beauty to the eyes,
as strength follows weakness,
as truth instead of lies,
as songtime and springtime
and summertime to be,
so is my Lord,
my living Lord,
so is my Lord to me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Like the calm in place of clamour,
like peace that follows pain,
like meeting after parting,
like sunshine after rain,
like moonlight and starlight
and sunshine on the sea,
so is my Lord,
my living Lord,
so is my Lord to me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
As sleep that follows fever,
as gold instead of gray,
as freedom after bondage,
as sunrise to the day;
as home to the traveller
and all we long to see,
so is my Lord,
my living Lord,
so is my Lord to me.
